item.title: By: Owran(Draka)
item.dc:creator: Owran(Draka)
item.description: At approximately 9:35 am this morning, two buildings in Shattarth were hit by two Nether Drakes, officials believe that Al Kida operatives were somehow involved. The search for Osma BinGdrinkin, lvl 70 Dwarf Terrorist and leader of Al Kida is now underway.
item.content:encoded: At approximately 9:35 am this morning, two buildings in Shattarth were hit by two Nether Drakes, officials believe that Al Kida operatives were somehow involved. The search for Osma BinGdrinkin, lvl 70 Dwarf Terrorist and leader of Al Kida is now underway.

item.title: By: brackishwater
item.dc:creator: brackishwater
item.description: I suspected something was up when someone invited "Al Kida" and "Dye YouEss" to the group. Be warned, these two were ninja looters and kept asking about the times the guards switched in Stormwind.
item.content:encoded: I suspected something was up when someone invited “Al Kida” and “Dye YouEss” to the group. Be warned, these two were ninja looters and kept asking about the times the guards switched in Stormwind.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
<blockquote>you might intentionally be messing with my head as well</blockquote>
My work here is done.
Yes, it is opposite the norm because I think the norm is stupid. But the norm is what it is and I'll change it back. I'm sure you're not the only one who noticed I was flauting blog-eity's conventions and experimenting with the time/space continuum.
UPDATE: Finished navigation changes. Older entries, older post will always be the left-clicky and newer entries/post always the right clicky. Anyone else looking to customize their WP navigation, good discussion on <a href="http://codex.wordpress.org/Template_Tags/posts_nav_link" rel="nofollow">the codex</a>, esp. Kubrick Theme Format.
item.content:encoded:
you might intentionally be messing with my head as well

My work here is done.

Yes, it is opposite the norm because I think the norm is stupid. But the norm is what it is and I’ll change it back. I’m sure you’re not the only one who noticed I was flauting blog-eity’s conventions and experimenting with the time/space continuum.

UPDATE: Finished navigation changes. Older entries, older post will always be the left-clicky and newer entries/post always the right clicky. Anyone else looking to customize their WP navigation, good discussion on the codex, esp. Kubrick Theme Format.

item.title: By: Leukos
item.dc:creator: Leukos
item.description:
Futon,
Love the blog, been reading it for months. Just a quick nit pick at the new layout, I keep finding myself clicking the button I think will take me to the next page in chronological order and finding that I have instead gone back a post. Maybe its just me, but it seems your buttons are opposite the norm... the right button takes you back not forward. Maybe its just me or my browser (IE at work :( ), but I think it is the way it is designed. Guess you might intentionally be messing with my head as well :)
Awesome blog, Kos
item.content:encoded:
Futon,

Love the blog, been reading it for months. Just a quick nit pick at the new layout, I keep finding myself clicking the button I think will take me to the next page in chronological order and finding that I have instead gone back a post. Maybe its just me, but it seems your buttons are opposite the norm… the right button takes you back not forward. Maybe its just me or my browser (IE at work üôÅ ), but I think it is the way it is designed. Guess you might intentionally be messing with my head as well üôÇ

Awesome blog,
Kos

item.title: By: Andrew Breese
item.dc:creator: Andrew Breese
item.description:
As Foton said, they should think before typing. Does this also mean that I can apply for counter-terrism jobs because I have a level 70 warlock, who is an Enchanter/Tailor?
Friggin silly.
item.content:encoded:
As Foton said, they should think before typing. Does this also mean that I can apply for counter-terrism jobs because I have a level 70 warlock, who is an Enchanter/Tailor?

Friggin silly.
